title: Big blue screen upon launching the Alpha Client.
body: So this problem has gone on for months since the Alpha began. I've tried uninstalling countless times and reinstalling, but every time I launch the client, it does the same thing and won't run/launch. It just brings up that screen that covers up my monitor screen. Is there any fix for this or am I screwed over when the legacy client switches over to the new client?

replies.body: Unfortunately, I'm not current with alpha issues or this particular problem.  Hit up our [Alpha boards ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/AMiK4QqL-alpha-client-wont-work)so fellow testers and dev can look into this.  Good luck!
